pkgmetadata.longdescription: robotpy-halsim-gui==================Installing this package will allow you to utilize the 2020+ WPILib GUIsimulation from a RobotPy program.Usage-----First, install pyfrc. Then run your robot with the 'sim' argument: # Windows py -3 ./robot.py sim # Linux/OSX python3 robot.py simWPILib's documentation for using the simulator can be found at http://docs.wpilib.org/en/latest/docs/software/wpilib-tools/robot-simulation/simulation-gui.html
